::Switchblade::

Switchblade leans forward with anticipation, "This is Nightstrike, in 
a few moments the bot will awaken. I need you to show it around." 
He makes a quick check over the bot for parts left out, and says, 
"Perfect..." He hefts a large machine gun, and puts it onto the bot. 
He unplugs anything attached to the bot, and waits for a sign that 
would introduce Nightstrike to the Decepticons, or more correctly, 
to Switchblade's Decepticons. His eyes glow intensly green, as he 
waits impatiently.

On 25 Apr 2001, at 0:32, gunthers8@... wrote:

> ::FireBlade::
> FireBlade finishes the mold and pours in his metal mixture. He sets 
> it to cool then looks around.
> "I see.....what is it?"
>
